company.tagline: Accelerate the Development of AI Applications
company.description: Scale is focused on developing reliable AI systems for important decisions. They provide high-quality data and full-stack technologies that power leading AI models and enable enterprises and governments to effectively build, deploy, and oversee AI applications.

growth_metrics.geographic_expansion: Expanding offices in New York, London, Washington D.C., and St. Louis to support growth, innovation, and reliable AI development worldwide.

events.title: Expanding Our Presence with New Offices Around the World
events.description: Scale AI is expanding offices in New York, London, Washington D.C., and St. Louis to support growth, innovation, and reliable AI development worldwide.

events.title: Talal AlBakr joins Scale AI
events.description: Talal AlBakr joins Scale AI to build production-ready AI applications that power Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030.

events.title: Scale AI Partners with Korea’s AI Safety Institute
events.description: Scale AI partners with Korea’s AI Safety Institute to advance global AI evaluation and governance.

events.title: Partnering with Lindbergh Schools
events.description: As part of our Pledge to America’s Youth, Scale AI is helping bring AI literacy into classrooms across America, starting in St. Louis.

events.title: Enterprise Reinforcement Learning with Rubrics as Rewards
events.description: Scale’s new method, Rubrics as Rewards, enables smaller models to outperform larger ones, translating directly to lower costs and tighter control for enterprises.
